title.rendered: University of Regina Admission Requirements 2024 | Applications & Deadlines

content.rendered:
The University of Regina (UR) Admission Requirements 2024 for Canadian and International Students, UR Application Deadlines 2024, UR International Admissions, Application Process for UR 2024. Online Application for prospective students is now open from January to Mayember, 2024

University of Regina (UR) Transcript: How to Submit

 

Application for admission into the University of Regina (UR) 2024 is open for online application from January to Mayember 2024. The application deadline covers the winter, Fall, and Spring admission for the 2024 academic year. Students aspiring to gain admission should note the following UR application deadline 2024

University of Regina Admission Requirements 2024

The general requirement for admission into the UR is given as follows. To apply for admission, prospective students must meet the criteria given below.

Click here: University of Regina Admission Requirement 2024

In addition to the requirement, prospective students should note admission is competitive, and meeting the minimum requirements does not guarantee admission.

Check UR Admission Requirements Before Applying

  • For Undergraduate Application for Admission or International Undergraduate Application for Admission, Study Permit is required.
  • Application fee (currently $100.00 – subject to change)
  • An official high school transcript showing final grades to date OR a school certified transcript
  • A schedule or list of current and remaining high school courses planned (can be listed directly on the application form)

 

University of Regina Application Fees:

Application fee cost: $100.00

How to Apply for UR Admission 2024 (Early conditional Admission)

  • Submit UR Application Online
  • Pay a Non-refundable Application Fee
  • Submit High School Transcripts

How to Submit UR Admission Application Online 2024

  • Go to https://banner.uregina.ca:17023/ssbprod/bwskalog.P_DispLoginNon
  • Login as First Time User
  • Generate Login ID & PIN
  • Fill in all necessary information correctly and submit

How to Pay for UR Admission Application Fee 2024

  • Go to https://banner.uregina.ca:17023/ssbprod/bwskalog.P_DispLoginNon
  • Login with a Login ID and PIN
  • Click payment Link
  • Click the PAY Application Fee button

University of Regina (UR) Transcript: How to Submit

To fully complete the UR Admission application, all students are required to submit High School Transcript to the university for admission authentication.

Students from Canadian Province should click here https://urconnected.uregina.ca/apply/highschooltranscripts.ezc

To send High School transcripts to UR for admission authentication, several platforms are open for Canadian Province students. They are;

  • British Columbia
  • Alberta
  • Manitoba
  • New Brunswick
  • New Foundland & Labrador
  • Northwest Territories
  • Maya Scotia
  • Nunavut
  • Ontario
  • Prince Edward Island
  • Quebec
  • Saskatchewan
  • Yukon

These and many more can be so easy to send High School transcripts to the University of Regina for Admission processes.
